ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question
ygData.msgSnippet: The key is for the velious ports.  Its a tooth looking thing and you need it to port to certain places there.  I think the Cobalt Scar one is the last one
ygData.messageBody:
The "key" is for the velious ports. Its a tooth looking thing and you need
it to port to certain places there. I think the Cobalt Scar one is the last
one and allows you to port to any of them. So if you get that one you will
only need the one "key"/tooth.

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 05, 2001 8:03 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wiz spires/ring in Tox question



Cool! Thanks!
One more thing, do I need any items to self port? I heard someone saying
they needed a "key" or something to port.
luv,
-Su

> No they do not. However there are quite a few roaming NPC's in Tox
forest.
> Some are still blue to 56 (one is an Enchanter). So after you get there I
> would invis myself.
>
> Mu
>

knowing

> Thanks.
> luv,
